sentences.en: Don't carry that heavy trunk, or you'll strain yourself.
sentences.cn: 箱子太沉,你别扛, 看努着.

sentences.en: Give me the trunk key and I'll get the spare.
sentences.cn: 把行李箱的钥匙给我,我去拿一下备胎.

sentences.en: He hewed a canoe out of a tree trunk.
sentences.cn: 他把一根树干凿成独木舟.

sentences.en: He left his bicycle leaning against a tree trunk .
sentences.cn: 他把他的自行车斜靠在树干上。

sentences.en: He left his bicycle leaning against a tree trunk.
sentences.cn: 他把他的自行车斜靠在树干上。

sentences.en: I managed to heave the trunk down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 我用力把箱子弄下楼梯。

sentences.en: In the guard's van lay my tin trunk.
sentences.cn: 我的铁皮箱放在了卫兵的行李车厢中。

sentences.en: ivy twining around a tree trunk
Maloney unlocked his trunk and took out some coveralls.
sentences.cn: 马洛尼把他的大箱子的锁打开了，拿出了一些工作服。

sentences.en: Manfred the elephant reached out with his trunk and gently scooped up the baby.
sentences.cn: 大象曼弗雷德伸出它的鼻子，轻轻地抱起了幼仔。

sentences.en: Rot in the tree trunk caused the tree to fall.
sentences.cn: 树干的腐烂导致树倒了.
这箱子用结实的布作衬里.

sentences.en: The boy could be seen with his legs wrapped around the trunk.
sentences.cn: 只见那男孩双腿盘着树干.

sentences.en: the diameter of a tree trunk
The roots transmit moisture and nutrient to the trunk and branches.
sentences.cn: 根将水分和养料输送到干和枝.

sentences.en: The tree trunk was hollow inside.
The two trees have grown together to form a double trunk.
sentences.cn: 这两棵树已长合在一起,成了一棵连理树.

sentences.en: There is a new trunk growing from the fallen dead tree.
sentences.cn: 从倒下的枯树上长出一棵新树干.

words.tran_cn: [航][铁路]干线的；躯干的；箱子的
箱子,盒子,手提箱,保险箱,篮子

phrases.tran_cn: 干线；中继线，长途电话线

trans.tran_en: the very long nose of an  elephant
